## üöÄ Quick start

1.  **Clone the repository**

    To get the code, you need to clone the repository.

    ```shell

    cd contentful_gatsby
    ```

2.  **Use the code and learn**
    Use the [Add Contentful Your Gatsby Website](https://www.kayla-gordon.com/contentful-gatsby) tutorial along with this code to get the most from it.
